channel.title: Writelatex on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Writelatex on My New Hugo Site

item.title: WriteLateX/Overleaf launch event at the British Library
item.description: Last Thursday I attended the launch event for OverLeaf. The event was composed of a set of very short talks, followed by a good chance to chat to people. It was a pretty nice evening. Dr Bibiana Campos Seijo - MRSC - magazines publisher and editor of chemistry world. Science is changing, publising is changing, a lot of this is being driven by technology. There is information overlaod. Publishers need to try to provide solutions to these issues.
